resources.string: The F87 :BMW M2 able acceleration from 0–100 km/h from 4.1 seconds 460 hp
The G80 :The BMW M3 Competition is also available, offering 510 hp
The G82 :The 3.0 liter petrol engine with 6 cylinders delivers 510 hp
The F90:BMW M5 CS accelerates from 0–100 km/h in 3.0 seconds with 635 hp
